Name: The Backrooms Experiment
About the game: The Backrooms Experiment The Backrooms Experience is a co-op walking simulator with horror and thriller elements. Find your way in barren levels of Backrooms, every level is unique with different enviroments, difficulties and gameplay mechanics. But remember, you are not alone in The Backrooms! Enemies There is Skinstealers, Partygoers and Smilers wandering the levels(and some surprise entities). Bacteria This tall black creature is lurking around level 0, if you hear heavy footsteps, just run as fast as you can. Skinstealers Entities that use other peoples skins as camuflages and mimic them to lure you into their trap. Partygoers These entities are too smart, fast and dangerous. But they are tiring too fast, you cant outrun them if they are too close, but if they cant catch you for a few seconds, they will just give up. Smiler These guys are smiling, and chasing you. Yeah, too scary. Multiplayer Cooperate with your friends, explore the levels and use your whistle to find your friends if they lost, but be carefull, entities hear that too!
